entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
